Hymn.Arabic: ۳٤ «لاَ تَظُنُّوا أَنِّي جِئْتُ لأُلْقِيَ سَلاَمًا عَلَى الأَرْضِ. مَا جِئْتُ لأُلْقِيَ سَلاَمًا بَلْ سَيْفًا.
Hymn.English: 34 Do not think that I came to bring peace on earth. I did not come to bring peace but a sword.

Hymn.Arabic: ۳٥ فَإِنِّي جِئْتُ لأُفَرِّقَ الإِنْسَانَ ضِدَّ أَبِيهِ، وَالابْنَةَ ضِدَّ أُمِّهَا، وَالْكَنَّةَ ضِدَّ حَمَاتِهَا.
Hymn.English: 35 For I have come to `set a man against his father, a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law';
36 and `a man's enemies will be those of his own household.'

Hymn.Arabic: ۳۷ مَنْ أَحَبَّ أَبًا أَوْ أُمًّا أَكْثَرَ مِنِّي فَلاَ يَسْتَحِقُّنِي، وَمَنْ أَحَبَّ ابْنًا أَوِ ابْنَةً أَكْثَرَ مِنِّي فَلاَ يَسْتَحِقُّنِي،
Hymn.English: 37 He who loves father or mother more than Me is not worthy of Me. And he who loves son or daughter more than Me is not worthy of Me.

Hymn.Arabic: ۳۸ وَمَنْ لاَ يَأْخُذُ صَلِيبَهُ وَيَتْبَعُني فَلاَ يَسْتَحِقُّنِي.
Hymn.English: 38 And he who does not take his cross and follow after Me is not worthy of Me.

Hymn.Arabic: ۳۹ مَنْ وَجَدَ حَيَاتَهُ يُضِيعُهَا، وَمَنْ أَضَاعَ حَيَاتَهُ مِنْ أَجْلِي يَجِدُهَا.
Hymn.English: 39 He who finds his life will lose it, and he who loses his life for My sake will find it.

Hymn.Arabic: ٤۰ مَنْ يَقْبَلُكُمْ يَقْبَلُنِي، وَمَنْ يَقْبَلُني يَقْبَلُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَنِي.
Hymn.English: 40 He who receives you receives Me, and he who receives Me receives Him who sent Me.

Hymn.Arabic: ٤۱ مَنْ يَقْبَلُ نَبِيًّا بِاسْمِ نَبِيٍّ فَأَجْرَ نَبِيٍّ يَأْخُذُ، وَمَنْ يَقْبَلُ بَارًّا بِاسْمِ بَارّ فَأَجْرَ بَارّ يَأْخُذُ،
Hymn.English: 41 He who receives a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet's reward. And he who receives a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man's reward.

Hymn.Arabic: ٤۲ وَمَنْ سَقَى أَحَدَ هؤُلاَءِ الصِّغَارِ كَأْسَ مَاءٍ بَارِدٍ فَقَطْ بِاسْمِ تِلْمِيذٍ، فَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ إِنَّهُ لاَ يُضِيعُ أَجْرَهُ».
Hymn.English: 42 And whoever gives one of these little ones only a cup of cold water in the name of a disciple, assuredly, I say to you, he shall by no means lose his reward.     Glory is due to our God to the age of all ages. Amen
